title: Fortress
creator_credit: Crawford Productions, Raymond Menmuir and Arch Nicholson
brief_description: Based on the novel by Gabrielle Lord. A teacher and her class of nine students are kidnapped by four masked men and held for ransom. The victims plot to escape by outwitting their captors.
creator_credit_for_label: Crawford Productions, Raymond Menmuir and Arch Nicholson
